document_data.name: Orlimar Belvrost
document_data.mainbody: '''Orlimar Belvrost''' was an [[adventurer]] and a member of the [[Belvrost]] clan.
document_data.Personality: His tales were so wild and exaggerated, they spanned twice his lifetime.
document_data.Possessions: He had an outrageous amount of gems, and clearly more money than he knew what to do with.
document_data.History: As of {{yearlink|1370}}, he was a wandering adventurer.
